tweets.text: @AaronBell4NUL What a time to be alive & struggling to breath  @ClareDinnisEA are you willing to let the bodies pile high in Newcastle under Lyme @EnvAgencyMids @PHE_uk when will you see the growing environment & health issues? You know this is wrong @StinkStopthe #stopthestink

tweets.text:
Legal fund to Stop The Stink . The town will need a lot of money and some big sponsors before we can start legal proceedings against big industry & the @EnvAgency but do it we must as the regulators have made it clear they will not fix this #stopthestink 
https://t.co/nvOZHafjhL

*This* is why we have a phosphate pollution problem in Herefordshire rivers. Massive pile of chicken muck dumped right next to watercourse. Completely against the farming rules for water. I’ve just reported it to @EnvAgency.  Totally unacceptable.  And not an isolated incident. https://t.co/1l45pAbllG

tweets.text: I don't usually do this sort of thing, but when it is on my local patch it really gets to me!! Scrub & tree removal in May is terrible practice. Please retweet. https://t.co/cYEIymHH0K Two videos showing the area & my concerns. @DevonWildlife @Natures_Voice @EnvAgency @kiergroup https://t.co/U8doUyBP5K
@BorisJohnson @ClareDinnisEA @DailyMailUK @PHE_uk @EnvAgencyMids it’s enough make a vicar swear!!! Ffs HELP!!!! @StinkStopthe https://t.co/Djh6zzcOUQ

Glad to talk to Stuart George today & be clear on the @EnvAgencyMids ongoing plan beyond the #enforcement notice deadline for capping at #WalleysQuarry. 

This is our next focus & we'll share more next week once we've done the assurance on @RedIndustries2 work so far. https://t.co/eIXsWqD1s0

Judging by social media it’s another appalling evening of odour - reports from Knutton, Milehouse, Wolstanton, Basford, Porthill. 😢🤢

Please keep reporting to the @EnvAgency on 0800 80 70 60 #StopTheStink

@ClareDinnisEA @EnvAgencyMids @RedIndustries2 If a restaurant served bad food and poisoned people environmental Heath would close them down straight away . This is an environment disaster why are you pussy footing around this . You have the evidence!
@ClareDinnisEA @EnvAgencyMids @RedIndustries2 I've just been outside. I'm over two miles away from the landfill. You have failed. You are irrelevant.
@ClareDinnisEA @EnvAgencyMids @RedIndustries2 Stop working with them and start taking them on. Gloves off please.
@ClareDinnisEA @EnvAgencyMids @RedIndustries2 Did you sleep well?  We have just spoken to a couple who spent the night in a tent to avoid the stench.!

@ClareDinnisEA @EnvAgencyMids @RedIndustries2 @ClareDinnisEA I know you must be busy right now at @WalleysL counting the outstanding breaches (clue you only have 10 digits on your hands so best get your shoes & socks off) but it absolutely stinks here. We are eagerly awaiting you engaging with us ASAP.
@StinkStopthe https://t.co/L05ZKwEmf7

You can’t make this up. The email for reporting to the @EnvAgency has now “broken” so you need to call to report the stink. This is very convenient as most people have been told to email in; emails hold more sway in a court of law. @StinkStopthe @ClareDinnisEA what is happening?

@ClareDinnisEA @EnvAgencyMids @RedIndustries2 One of the worst nights ever last night @ClareDinnisEA 
We are literally at the point that if we get it’s any worse or more frequent we will abandon the house & move in with family.This has got to stop @JamesBevanEA @EnvAgency @Cap_it_off @MPGeorgeEustice #stopthestink
@AaronBell4NUL @EnvAgency I’m pretty sure I could smell it driving down the D Road close to the Golden hill junction.
@Samanth33412592 @ClareDinnisEA @JamesBevanEA @EnvAgencyMids @PHE_uk @StinkStopthe @Cap_it_off Silverdale this morning, my house full of toxic stench. Disgraceful

Landfill sites need to go, they are a widespread problem! Our friends in #Newcastleunderlyme are being subjected to the same tortuous odour! @StinkStopthe @Cap_it_off @daera_ni 

#airpollution #airquality #Belfast #lisburn #newcastleunderlyme #silverdale @EnvAgency https://t.co/er4meRnUeR

The Fog. Hydrogen Sulfide hell. You need to read these photos @EnvAgency @EnvAgencyMids @AaronBell4NUL @BorisJohnson @StinkStopthe #WalleysQuarry #capitoff #Mullaghglass #BiffaWestmill https://t.co/P2OYgoJgtX

tweets.text: @StinkStopthe @Feargal_Sharkey @EnvAgency @ClareDinnisEA @JamesBevanEA both happy to let the bodies pile high https://t.co/RMXbwlP0oT #stopthestink

@EnvAgencyMids @RedIndustries2 Given that you know very well that the community will be holding their breaths (literally) for a update today, it’s bit disrespectful to stay silent @ClareDinnisEA #StopTheStink

@tatton_david @tayz_BETH @SimonTagg @Helen_Clinton @EnvAgency @RedIndustries2 The pattern here is a local company promise to pay over £1 million to local clubs, charities etc then buy the landfill  on cheap. Complaints start to begin but Council ignore. Company gets authority to tip 60% more waste and complaints go ballistic! Blame game begins, no action!
@HelenVi00175623 @StinkStopthe @Kimble8313 @EnvAgencyMids @ClareDinnisEA @Cap_it_off We didn't get one, thought we wouldn't need it, do they work, tonight is horrendous.

@SianieRoo @Cap_it_off @StinkStopthe @EnvAgency @ClareDinnisEA @JamesBevanEA @PHE_EoEngland @StaffordshireCC @AaronBell4NUL @SimonTagg  this is seriously is not an overreaction. I think we have a critical situation in N-u-L and Stoke tonight. We are watching people falling apart and it's scaring me. It is so bad something major must have gone wrong at the site @StinkStopthe @Cap_it_off

@EnvAgencyMids I am trying to email a complaint about the smell from Walleys landfill and your email is blocked. It worked yesterday. This seems rather odd. The smell is inside my house and my eyes are really sore. @StinkStopthe #stopthestink

It doesnt take a modern Aldous Huxley to see that a dystopian future rings tragic bells here #WalleysQuarrey
#stopthestink @PHE_uk @PHE_WestMids @EnvAgencyMids @EnvAgency @stopthestink https://t.co/3EIzZzYAFB

Back home last night. House is full of landfill gas, think i lost my waters, started contractions again and now I’m back on delivery suite. I AM 30 WEEKS! Fuming with @RedIndustries2 right now. @StinkStopthe @Cap_it_off @EnvAgency @EnvAgencyMids @PHE_uk @PHE_WestMids

Dr. Neil Carman, published a study (2001) that concluded growing children are more vulnerable to hydrogen sulphide because they breathe more rapidly, taking in significantly more pollution than adults. @ClareDinnisEA @EnvAgency @StinkStopthe over 30 mins at 5 ppb INDOORS.
We need you to act now @BorisJohnson @MattHancock @ClareDinnisEA @WHO @EnvAgency @EnvAgencyMids @BBCNews @SkyNews it’s an #environmentaldisaster https://t.co/dr4taL0QCf

urls.title: UK’s Environmental Enforcement Gap – Agencies failing to act - Unchecked UK - Communications and Management for Sustainability
urls.description: In both of her recent letters to the Times Emma Howard Boyd about the cut to the funding of  the Environment Agency by over 50% since 2010. This theme is being picked up by various people. The Times has lead on how this has lead to a reduction in inspections by Food Inspectors and a […]

domain.name: TV Shows
domain.description: Television shows from around the world

entity.name: Countryfile
entity.description: Stories are shared of the people, places and issues at the heart of the British countryside. Popular features include the programme's photography contest, which culminates in a yearly calendar sold to benefit charity, the Video Diary, produced by viewers and focused on life in rural areas, and the weather forecasts.

domain.name: TV Shows
domain.description: Television shows from around the world

entity.name: Countryfile Diaries
entity.description: A sister show to the BBC's `Countryfile' series, this rural affairs programme sees a team of presenters travel the length and breadth of the United Kingdom to cover stories related to the British countryside and the season of spring. As this period is a busy time of the year for the farming and outdoor communities in particular, regular topics covered include the production of food, nature conservation, and a look at a chosen area's culture and history. Stunning landscapes and a variety of wildlife also feature prominently.

tweets.text:
EA UPDATE

The @EnvAgency have issued an update this evening, ahead of the midnight deadline.

Reading between the lines, it seems that the EA are not confident that the capping work will produce the reduction in odour we have been hoping for.

This is very disappointing. (1/2) https://t.co/DIZFt1teMz

Newcastle under Lyme residents emerging from what appears to have been a major environmental incident of unprecedented proportions in this town invaded & poisoned by landfill toxic fumes from @RedIndustries2 allowed by @EnvAgency #stopthestink @StinkStopthe https://t.co/ImG0xFd5uL

@Samanth33412592 @LoneRanger77777 @hopeternalall @StinkStopthe @EnvAgency @ClareDinnisEA I just feel like people are getting to breaking point. I know we cannot continue to live like this. Something has to improve or NUL will be a ghost town, with those left ill and isolated #StopTheStink Clearly the system is failing us, we need to explore human rights avenues.

@StinkStopthe @EnvAgency @BorisJohnson @AaronBell4NUL They have also been on site today (01/05/21) inspecting the ineffectiveness of the capping... something is seriously wrong #stopthestink  Walley Landfill still out of control
